line_2: Can in this time of Storms be heard.
Hearing, and telling what he heard.

line_1: Stand good, that by no benefits conferr'd,
line_2: 'Twixt Man and Man, which might, if Justice heard,

line_1: On loitering monks its native wealth conferr'd,
line_2: Still other blessings from this change appear'd;

line_1: On heroes, patriots, righteous kings conferr'd.

line_2: And all ador'd th' Athenian bird.
